imdb.title: Kimi to Boku
imdb.plot: The high school students in Kimi to Boku. consider their school life to be anything but exciting. A repetitive journey through classes, arguments, and orientations for future careers that seem way too distant. But with the right g...

episodes.title: In Our 17th Spring
episodes.plot: Shun is now a Second Year High School student, together with his childhood friends Yuuta, Yuuki and Kaname.

episodes.title: The Day the Tulips Bloomed
episodes.plot: Shun, waiting for his friends to eat lunch together finds a girl with a scraped knee. He attempted to confront her, but she ran away.

episodes.title: The Boy with Strawcolored hair
episodes.plot: A new student transferred to Yuuki and Kaname's class. His name is Chizuru Tachibana, a half-Japanese transfer student from Germany.

episodes.title: Noisy Medicine
episodes.plot: After an evening with his friends, Kaname catches a cold in which was not the worst of his troubles for today.

episodes.title: Sometime During Summer
episodes.plot: It's the first day of summer. Chizuru decides to invite his friends to go out, but is rejected by all but Shun. Shun suggests inviting everyone, including Masaki, "Mary," to the summer festival.

episodes.title: Glasses and Et Cetera
episodes.plot: At Kaname's house, the gang decided to cut Shun's hair short. While preparing to study for their exams, they talk about when Kaname started wearing glasses.

episodes.title: Next to an Apple
episodes.plot: Chizuru, Kaname, Yuuki and Shun saw an unexpected confession of a quiet and shy girl to Yuuta. Even so, Yuuta does not tell any information regarding the incident to his friends.

episodes.title: Daily Wage Hero; Senpai and Me
episodes.plot: Yuuki has been asked by a first year student named Ryunosuke Matsushita, to draw a five-page manga for the club's anthology. On the side story, it reveals that Ryunosuke Matsushita admires Yuuki and thinks of him as his "hero".

episodes.title: Naked King
episodes.plot: In a matter of days, the Homare High School Cultural Festival will start. Everyone is busy their preparations and also having fun in between.

episodes.title: On Your Mark
episodes.plot: It's finally the day of the Cultural Festival and everyone prepares for their respective groups.

episodes.title: Crescent Moon Sillhouette
episodes.plot: The gang decides to eat at the school cafeteria.
